name: Secretlab TITAN Evo 2024
image_prompt: Secretlab TITAN Evo gaming chair, black leatherette, ergonomic design, 4D armrests, lumbar support pillow
description: Premium ergonomic gaming chair with proprietary Neo Hybrid Leatherette, 4-way L-ADAPT lumbar support, and cold-cure foam. Supports up to 395lbs with full recline and magnetic accessories.

reviews.review_text: Best chair I have owned. Back pain gone after a month.
Built like a tank. Lumbar support is a game changer.
Takes a week to break in but worth the wait.
